greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 1; for n > 0, a(n) = A000005(n) * a(n-A000005(n)), where A000005(n) gives the number of divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..150
mathematica: Nest[Append[#1, #2 #1[[-#2]] ] & @@ {#, DivisorSigma[0, Length@ #]} &, {1}, 53] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 25 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 24 2018
